page.title: 13HOUSING West Forres
page.content: In recent years some housing development has taken place.At Mannachie and Red Craig small private housing estates have been built.At Red Craig the connecting road is part of the old Forres Airfield runway and it has badly deteriorated over the years.Residents have repeatedly asked the council to repair this road but with little success.A very small part of the Thornhill Estate encroaches on this area.Mostly semi-detached and terraced houses,planning permission has been obtained to extend this estate in the near future.Other housing is mainly scattered and much of it is the property of Darnaway or Altyre Estates.No longer needed for workers these are mainly let to young couples awaiting housing in Forres or RAF personnel.The renovation of old cottages has become very popular.
